alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:47AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dickenson and southern Buchanan Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 446 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over John Flannagan Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grundy, Haysi, Davenport, Breaks Interstate, John Flannagan Lake, Clinchco, Vansant and Oakwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
